markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 377 4.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Range** 30 feet **Target** 1 creature --- You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage—as appropriate for the object you hurled—equal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage. **Critical Success** You deal double damage.
**Success** You deal full damage. --- **Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d6.
name: Telekinetic Projectile

summary: Fling an object at a creature.
summary_markdown: Fling an object at a creature.
text: Telekinetic Projectile Source Core Rulebook pg. 377 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Target 1 creature --- You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage—as appropriate for the object you hurled—equal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage. Critical Success You deal double damage. Success You deal full damage. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.
